participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and determined, Emily is focused on her studies and enjoys spending time with friends.
participant_1.background: i don't like chicken. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i am in college to become a nurse. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.

participant_2.name: Frank
participant_2.personality: Generous and passionate about education, Frank enjoys sharing his knowledge and helping others.
participant_2.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.
